p: In the four non-diarrhoeic samples, the number of viral reads obtained and indexed was lower compared to those of the diarrhoeic samples, none of the mammalian virus detected surpasses 10E0 to 10E1 reads (Additional file 1). In contrast, a large number of reads were indexed against RNA viruses of plants (i.e. Fabavirus, Bromovirus, Fijivirus, Luteovirus) and fungi (i.e. Hypovirus, Alphapartivirus).
